追慕: (ついぼ) - cherishing the memory of; yearning for
追抜く: (おいぬく) - to pass (a car)/to overtake; to surpass/to outstrip/to outdistance/to outsail
追捕: (ついほ) - chasing down and capturing (a criminal, etc.)
追掛ける: (おいかける) - to chase; to run after; to pursue
追撃機: (ついげきき) - pursuit or chase plane
追放: (ついほう) - exile; banishment; eviction; deportation; transportation
追散らす: (おいちらす) - to drive away; to scatter; to rout
追求: (tsuikyuu) - pursuit (de um objetivo, ideal, etc.), search, chase, seeking after
追河: (オイカワ) - freshwater minnow; pale chub (Zacco platypus)
追物射: (おんものい) - shooting a fleeing target (usu. animal) from horseback
追着く: (おいつく) - to overtake; to catch up (with)
追究: (ついきゅう) - investigation (e.g. academically, of the unknown); enquiry; inquiry
追窮: (ついきゅう) - investigation (e.g. academically, of the unknown); enquiry; inquiry
追立てる: (おいたてる) - to drive on/to urge forward (e.g. cattle)/to rouse (game from its cover)/to shoo away; to press a tenant to leave/to evict
追羽子: (おいばね) - battledore and shuttlecock game (played at the beginning of the year)
追羽根: (おいばね) - battledore and shuttlecock game (played at the beginning of the year)
追而: (おって) - (追って only) later on/shortly/presently/afterwards/in due course/by and by; P.S.
追腹: (おいばら) - following one's master into death by committing ritual suicide (seppuku)
追落し: (おいおとし) - chasing down/pushing down/deposing/ousting; sacrificing to create a shortage of liberties, then capturing (in the game of go)
追落とし: (おいおとし) - chasing down/pushing down/deposing/ousting; sacrificing to create a shortage of liberties, then capturing (in the game of go)
追討: (ついとう) - tracking down and killing; punitive expedition
追記: (tsuiki) - PS, postscript; appending, addition (especialmente de dados, informações)
追記型光ディスク: (ついきがたひかりディスク) - direct read after write optical disk
追証: (おいしょう) - {finc}  additional cover; more margin
追証拠金: (おいしょうこきん) - {finc} additional cover; more margin
追贈: (ついぞう) - conferring court rank posthumously
追越す: (おいこす) - to pass (e.g. car)/to overtake; to surpass/to outstrip/to get ahead of/to outdistance
追跡: (tsuiseki) - perseguição, perseguição, rastreamento, espreita; acompanhamento, rastreio
追跡プログラム: (ついせきプログラム) - trace program
追跡番号: (ついせきばんごう) - tracking number (e.g. for orders)
追跡調査: (ついせきちょうさ) - (yoji) follow-up (tracing) survey
追蹤: (ついしょう) - chase; pursuit; tracking; stalking
追追: (おいおい) - gradually; by degrees; little by little; step by step
追送: (ついそう) - sending an additional part later
追送検: (ついそうけん) - forwarding documents regarding an additional charge to the public prosecutor
追随者: (ついずいしゃ) - acolyte; adherent; follower; imitator; copycat
追風: (おいて) - tailwind/fair wind/favorable wind (favourable); favorable condition (favourable)/advantageous situation
退き時: (ひきどき) - a good time to quit
退く: (しりぞく) - to step back/to move back; to leave (the presence of a superior)/to withdraw/to retreat/to concede; to resign/to retire/to quit
退ける: (しりぞける) - to repel; to drive away; to repulse; to reject
退っ引きならない: (のっぴきならない) - unavoidable; inevitable
退める: (やめる) - to resign; to retire; to quit; to leave (one's job, etc.)
退京: (たいきょう) - leaving the capital; leaving Tokyo
退任: (たいにん) - retirement; resignation; stepping down
退任展: (たいにんてん) - farewell exhibition; retrospective (exhibition); exhibition in commemoration of retirement
退会: (たいかい) - withdrawal from a group; resignation; secession; unsubscribing (mailing list, etc.)
退出: (たいしゅつ) - leaving (e.g. work at end of day); withdrawal (e.g. from a noble's or superior's presence); exit (e.g. from a market)
退勢: (たいせい) - decline; one's declining fortunes; decay
退勢挽回: (たいせいばんかい) - (yoji) restoring the declining fortunes; recovering from the discouraging situation; reversing the downward trend
退勤: (たいきん) - leaving work; clocking out
退団: (たいだん) - leaving a group or troupe
退園: (たいえん) - leaving a park, garden, zoo, etc.; leaving kindergarten (e.g. end of day, on completion, expulsion)
